title: i can not download league of legends in my mac(it's mac os sierra)

replies.body: don't bother , its unplayable on os sierra anyways
BUMP. This sub needs more posts it's the only one open for this issue

Can you give me some more details as to how you're encountering issues with this? Do you see an error message or anything? 

Try [**this link**](https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/Mac_ShellInstaller/NA/League%20of%20Legends%20NA.dmg) and let me know if you still have issues.

it's, i have updated my mac to mac os sierra. then the fps has been very low. i just considered it was the problem of the game then i deleted it and tried to download a new one. however, the installation package i downloaded can not be ran. that's it.

Can you [take a screenshot](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201361) of your error and your [Mac Details](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201581) (without displaying your serial number) and send them to me via [Imgur](https://imgur.com/)?
